Reason: The configuration option DROP_RESTRICT in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When set to restrict dropping, it may lead to increased memory consumption and slower execution times due to the system's need to retain more data. On the other hand, setting it to not restrict dropping may result in faster execution times but potentially at the cost of data integrity and reliability. Therefore, the value of DROP_RESTRICT has a notable effect on system performance, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
